For Non-Patched;

[60 FPS for 3DS]
08C15270 42700000

[30 FPS for 3DS]
08C15270 41F00000

[Game Speed x2]
08C1526C 42700000

[Game Speed x1]
08C1526C 41F00000

[Disable AA]
0818DFE0 001F412A
{will disable 3D slider.}
